channel.title: Issue with sound effect: Gargantua walks and barks after its dead
channel.description:
System configuration: OS: Windows 10 Home Edition 64 bit. Processor: i5-3570, 4 cores, 3,4-3,8 GHz. Video card: Radeon R9 280 3Gb. RAM: 16 Gb. 2 sticks of 8. SSD for OS and HDD for game included.
Steps to reproduce: 1. Start a Chapter 7 'Power up'. 2. Kill Gargantua. 3. Go to: map : bm_c2a1a at: 838 x, -975 y, 96 z setpos 838.368958 -975.347412 96.031250;setang 11.909152 172.088348 0.000000 4. Listen a sound.
Expected result: there are no Gargantua's sound effect in the area after it is dead.
Actual result: there are Gargantua's sound effect in the area after it is dead. You can hear how it is walking and screaming. You have got feeling it is alive. In this moment you want to be sure it is dead.
Priority: major (only because I don't like Gargantua, it makes me scary!)
![bm_c2a1a0000|690x431](upload://jVFhpV2OXCxVbfr0STOguwaYTQJ.jpeg) ![bm_c2a1a0001|690x431](upload://aMnwEsI92PY6oOdY6glLz6MMyVi.jpeg)

item.title: Issue with sound effect: Gargantua walks and barks after its dead
item.dc:creator: Sieben
item.description:
I agree, gargantuas are frightening, especially when they are chasing you, in Power Up and at the end of Surface Tension!

Also, thanks for the bugs hunting you’ve been doing recently, hope it’ll be helpful for the devs

item.title: Issue with sound effect: Gargantua walks and barks after its dead
item.dc:creator: StrangerElite
item.description:
System configuration:
OS: Windows 10 Home Edition 64 bit.
Processor: i5-3570, 4 cores, 3,4-3,8 GHz.
Video card: Radeon R9 280 3Gb.
RAM: 16 Gb. 2 sticks of 8.
SSD for OS and HDD for game included.

Steps to reproduce:

  1. Start a Chapter 7 ‘Power up’.
  2. Kill Gargantua.
  3. Go to:
    map : bm_c2a1a at: 838 x, -975 y, 96 z
    setpos 838.368958 -975.347412 96.031250;setang 11.909152 172.088348 0.000000
  4. Listen a sound.

Expected result: there are no Gargantua’s sound effect in the area after it is dead.

Actual result: there are Gargantua’s sound effect in the area after it is dead. You can hear how it is walking and screaming. You have got feeling it is alive. In this moment you want to be sure it is dead.

Priority: major (only because I don’t like Gargantua, it makes me scary!)
